attr.title: Znax
attr.desc: Znax is a sort of puzzle / arcade game where you as the player need to select 4 blocks of the same color and form rectangles as big as you can. By doing this you will erase all blocks in this rectangle and they will be replaced by new blocks. You keep on doing this till the time runs out, and try to gain your highest score possible.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play.
